name: WRAP+ UNLIMITED FOR LIFETIME
description: Python Script to Get WRAP+ VPN unlimited for Lifetime

SEND_LOG.description: If you want log of Script in Telegram Channel or Group. 0 for No and 1 for Yes

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter BOT TOKEN (API KEY) from Bot Father. Required only if SEND_LOG is 1

CHANNEL_ID.description: Enter CHANNEL/GROUP ID with @ like @example. Required only if SEND_LOG is 1

HIDE_ID.description: To hide WARP_ID in the log message send to Telegram Channel or Group. 0 for No and 1 for Yes
